  • Constructor Details

    • TrelloAPI

      public TrelloAPI​(String boardName, String apiKey, String apiToken)
      Base class for requesting information from the Trello API.
      Parameters:
      boardName - Name of the board.
      apiKey - Trello API access key.
      apiToken - Trello API access token.

      public TrelloAPI.Board[] getBoards() throws IOException
      Returns:
      a list of all boards owned by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the request fails.

      Throws:
      IOException - If the request fails.

      Parameters:

      sprintType - ceremony of the sprint.

      Returns:

      IOException - If the request fails.

      Parameters:

      sprintNumber - number of the sprint.
      Returns:

      IOException - If the request fails.

    • getTotalHoursByUser

      Parameters:

      boardQuery - name present on the list name.
      cardQuery - name present on the card name.
      Returns:

      IOException - If the request fails.
